io.minio.org.apache.commons.validator.routines

Class InetAddressValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.minio.org.apache.commons.validator.routines.InetAddressValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class InetAddressValidator
extends Object
implements Serializable
    InetAddress validation and conversion routines (java.net.InetAddress).

    This class provides methods to validate a candidate IP address.

    This class is a Singleton; you can retrieve the instance via the getInstance() method.

    Since:
    Validator 1.4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isValidInet4Address

        public boolean isValidInet4Address(String inet4Address)
        Validates an IPv4 address. Returns true if valid.
        Parameters:
        inet4Address - the IPv4 address to validate
        Returns:
        true if the argument contains a valid IPv4 address

        Returns:
